data.Description: THE FILLMORE AUDITORIUM IS A GENERAL ADMISSION VENUE

data.Name: El Alfa
data.Bio: Emmanuel Herrera Batista, known professionally as El Alfa, is a Dominican dembow recording artist, In 2015, after receiving criticism for insulting the founding fathers of the Dominican Republic in a music video, El Alfa was sentenced to 15 days of community service. The President of El Instituto Duartino, Cesar Romero called for the boycott and destruction of El Alfa's albums for having disrespected the founding fathers. Part of El Alfa's sentencing Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: [dunkelbunt]
data.Bio: Vienna, Austria based DJ & producer dunkelbunt (alias Ulf Lindemann) has travelled Eastern Europe by bike to discover and collect different sounds and emotions. In his music traditional Balkan and Klezmer sounds meet reggae, dub and electronica. dunkelbunt mixes Dub, Reggae, Bossa, Jazz, Electronics, Trip Hop and Break Beats woven with a Balkan twist. Numerous co-operations with both Viennese and international musicians from the Balkan and Klezmer scenes have enriched many of his tracks - namely performers like 5â€™nizza Read more on Last.fm
